turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can I order pizza from Bella Luna's, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Montonis, can I get a meat lover's pizza? And the second one, can I get

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Supreme Pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick-up, delivery or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The pickup, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make those pizzas thin-crust too? Sorry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me add that to the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $28.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i'll order that for you, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and you said you wanted pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat that order for me, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i have ordered you 2 small thin crust pizzas, 1 meat lovers and 1 supreme.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
